channel.title: Introduction :: K-State CIS 400 Textbook
channel.description: Now that we’ve explored building web applications and writing web servers, we’ll explore in more detail how to make them available on the web, a process known as deployment. Key Terms Some key terms to learn in this chapter are: Deployment IP Address IPV4 IPV6 Domain Name Ports Virtual Machine Key Skills The key skills to develop in this chapter are: Setting up your web applications to deploy to a virtual machine
